mapper.insert: INSERT klass (course_id, grade, klass_serial, klass_time, klass_location) VALUE (#{klass.course.courseId}, #{klass.grade}, #{klass.klassSerial}, #{klass.klassTime}, #{klass.klassPlace})
mapper.select: select klass.id as klassId, grade, klass_serial, klass_time, klass_location, course.id as courseId, course_name as courseName from klass, course where klass.id = #{klassId} and course.id = klass.course_id
select klass.id as klassId, grade, klass_serial, klass_time, klass_location from klass, course where klass.course_id = #{courseId} and course.id = klass.course_id
select klass_id as klassId, enroll_number as enrollNumber from klass_round where round_id = #{roundId}

select klass.id as klassId, grade, klass_serial, klass_time, klass_location, course.id as courseId, course_name as courseName from klass, klass_student, course where klass_student.student_id = #{studentId} and klass.id = klass_student.klass_id and course.id = klass.course_id
